title: The Todd Starnes Show – September 17th, 2019
text:
Here's what happened today on The Todd Starnes Show:

Todd speaks with U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) Acting Director Ken Cuccinelli about what the Trump Administration is doing at the border.

Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

Todd speaks with Rep. Richard Hudson (R-NC) about how high school students in his district were put on probation after posing with a pro-Trump banner.

Todd speaks with the owners of Brush & Nib Studio and their attorney about their victory for religious freedom in Arizona.

Todd speaks with Pastor Max Lucado about his book "How Happiness Happens" and how to find the secret to happiness.
